tagMetadata.name: GPSVersionID
tagMetadata.description: Version of the Global Positioning Systems (GPS) IFD, given as 2.0.0.0. This tag is mandatory when the GpsIFD tag is present. When the version is 2.0.0.0, the tag value is 0x02000000.

tagMetadata.name: GPSLatitudeRef
tagMetadata.description: Indicates whether the latitude is north or south latitude. The ASCII value 'N' indicates north latitude, and 'S' is south latitude.

tagMetadata.name: GPSLatitude
tagMetadata.description: Indicates the latitude. The latitude is expressed as three RATIONAL values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds, respectively. When degrees, minutes and seconds are expressed, the format is dd/1,mm/1,ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is dd/1,mmmm/100,0/1.

tagMetadata.name: GPSLongitudeRef
tagMetadata.description: Indicates whether the longitude is east or west longitude. The ASCII value 'E' indicates east longitude, and 'W' is west longitude.

tagMetadata.name: GPSLongitude
tagMetadata.description: Indicates the longitude. The longitude is expressed as three RATIONAL values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds, respectively. When degrees, minutes and seconds are expressed, the format is ddd/1,mm/1,ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is ddd/1,mmmm/100,0/1.

tagMetadata.name: GPSAltitudeRef
tagMetadata.description: Reference altitude, in meters.

tagMetadata.name: GPSAltitude
tagMetadata.description: Altitude, in meters, based on the reference altitude specified by GpsAltitudeRef.

tagMetadata.name: GPSTimeStamp
tagMetadata.description: Time as coordinated universal time (UTC). The value is expressed as three rational numbers that give the hour, minute, and second.

tagMetadata.name: GpsSatellites
tagMetadata.description: Specifies the GPS satellites used for measurements. This tag can be used to specify the ID number, angle of elevation, azimuth, SNR, and other information about each satellite. The format is not specified. If the GPS receiver is incapable of taking measurements, the value of the tag must be set to NULL.

tagMetadata.name: GpsStatus
tagMetadata.description: Specifies the status of the GPS receiver when the image is recorded. 'A' means measurement is in progress, and 'V' means the measurement is Interoperability.

tagMetadata.name: GpsMeasureMode
tagMetadata.description: Specifies the GPS measurement mode. 2 specifies 2-D measurement, and 3 specifies 3-D measurement.

tagMetadata.name: GpsDop
tagMetadata.description: GPS DOP (data degree of precision). An HDOP value is written during 2-D measurement, and a PDOP value is written during 3-D measurement.

tagMetadata.name: GPSSpeedRef
tagMetadata.description: Specifies the unit used to express the GPS receiver speed of movement. K , M , and N represent kilometers per hour, miles per hour, and knots respectively.

tagMetadata.name: GPSSpeed
tagMetadata.description: Speed of the GPS receiver movement.

tagMetadata.name: GPSTrackRef
tagMetadata.description: Specifies the reference for giving the direction of GPS receiver movement. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

tagMetadata.name: GPSTrack
tagMetadata.description: Direction of GPS receiver movement. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

tagMetadata.name: GPSImgDirRef
tagMetadata.description: Specifies the reference for the direction of the image when it is captured. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

tagMetadata.name: GPSImgDir
tagMetadata.description: Direction of the image when it was captured. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

tagMetadata.name: GPSMapDatum
tagMetadata.description: Indicates the geodetic survey data used by the GPS receiver. If the survey data is restricted to Japan, the value of this tag is 'TOKYO' or 'WGS-84'.

tagMetadata.name: GPSDestLatRef
tagMetadata.description: Specifies whether the latitude of the destination point is north or south latitude. N specifies north latitude, and S specifies south latitude.

tagMetadata.name: GPSDestLat
tagMetadata.description: Latitude of the destination point. The latitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is dd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is dd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

tagMetadata.name: GPSDestLongRef
tagMetadata.description: Specifies whether the longitude of the destination point is east or west longitude. E specifies east longitude, and W specifies west longitude.

tagMetadata.name: GPSDestLong
tagMetadata.description: Longitude of the destination point. The longitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is ddd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is ddd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

tagMetadata.name: GPSDestBearRef
tagMetadata.description: Specifies the reference used for giving the bearing to the destination point. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

tagMetadata.name: GPSDestBear
tagMetadata.description: Bearing to the destination point. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

tagMetadata.name: GPSDestDistRef
tagMetadata.description: Specifies the unit used to express the distance to the destination point. 'K', 'M', and 'N' represent kilometers, miles, and knots respectively.

tagMetadata.name: GPSDestDist
tagMetadata.description: Distance to the destination point.

tagMetadata.name: NewSubfileType
tagMetadata.description: Type of data in a subfile.

tagMetadata.name: SubfileType
tagMetadata.description: Type of data in a subfile.

tagMetadata.name: ImageWidth
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixels per row.

tagMetadata.name: ImageHeight
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixel rows.

tagMetadata.name: BitsPerSample
tagMetadata.description: Number of bits per color component.

tagMetadata.name: Compression
tagMetadata.description: Compression scheme used for the image data.

tagMetadata.name: PhotometricInterp
tagMetadata.description: How pixel data will be interpreted.

tagMetadata.name: ThreshHolding
tagMetadata.description: Technique used to convert from gray pixels to black and white pixels.

tagMetadata.name: CellWidth
tagMetadata.description: Width of the dithering or halftoning matrix.

tagMetadata.name: CellHeight
tagMetadata.description: Height of the dithering or halftoning matrix.

tagMetadata.name: FillOrder
tagMetadata.description: Logical order of bits in a byte.

tagMetadata.name: DocumentName
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the document from which the image was scanned.

tagMetadata.name: ImageDescription
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the title of the image.

tagMetadata.name: EquipMake
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the manufacturer of the equipment used to record the image.

tagMetadata.name: EquipModel
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the model name or model number of the equipment used to record the image.

tagMetadata.name: StripOffsets
tagMetadata.description: For each strip, the byte offset of that strip.

tagMetadata.name: Orientation
tagMetadata.description: Image orientation viewed in terms of rows and columns.

option.value: The 0th row is at the visual top of the image, and the 0th column is the visual left-hand side.
The 0th row is at the visual top of the image, and the 0th column is the visual right-hand side.
The 0th row is at the visual bottom of the image, and the 0th column is the visual right-hand side.
The 0th row is at the visual bottom of the image, and the 0th column is the visual left-hand side.
The 0th row is the visual left-hand side of of the image, and the 0th column is the visual top.
The 0th row is the visual right-hand side of of the image, and the 0th column is the visual top.
The 0th row is the visual right-hand side of of the image, and the 0th column is the visual bottom.
The 0th row is the visual left-hand side of of the image, and the 0th column is the visual bottom.

tagMetadata.name: SamplesPerPixel
tagMetadata.description: Number of color components per pixel.

tagMetadata.name: RowsPerStrip
tagMetadata.description: Number of rows per strip.

tagMetadata.name: StripBytesCount
tagMetadata.description: For each strip, the total number of bytes in that strip.

tagMetadata.name: MinSampleValue
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, the minimum value assigned to that component.

tagMetadata.name: MaxSampleValue
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, the maximum value assigned to that component.

tagMetadata.name: XResolution
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixels per unit in the image width (x) direction. The unit is specified by ResolutionUnit.

tagMetadata.name: YResolution
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixels per unit in the image height (y) direction. The unit is specified by ResolutionUnit.

tagMetadata.name: PlanarConfig
tagMetadata.description: Whether pixel components are recorded in chunky or planar format.

tagMetadata.name: PageName
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the page from which the image was scanned.

tagMetadata.name: XPosition
tagMetadata.description: Offset from the left side of the page to the left side of the image. The unit of measure is specified by ResolutionUnit.

tagMetadata.name: YPosition
tagMetadata.description: Offset from the top of the page to the top of the image. The unit of measure is specified by ResolutionUnit.

tagMetadata.name: FreeOffset
tagMetadata.description: For each string of contiguous unused bytes, the byte offset of that string.

tagMetadata.name: FreeByteCounts
tagMetadata.description: For each string of contiguous unused bytes, the number of bytes in that string.

tagMetadata.name: GrayResponseUnit
tagMetadata.description: Precision of the number specified by GrayResponseCurve. 1 specifies tenths, 2 specifies hundredths, 3 specifies thousandths, and so on.

tagMetadata.name: GrayResponseCurve
tagMetadata.description: For each possible pixel value in a grayscale image, the optical density of that pixel value.

tagMetadata.name: T4Option
tagMetadata.description: Set of flags that relate to T4 encoding.

tagMetadata.name: T6Option
tagMetadata.description: Set of flags that relate to T6 encoding.

tagMetadata.name: ResolutionUnit
tagMetadata.description: Unit of measure for the horizontal resolution and the vertical resolution.

tagMetadata.name: PageNumber
tagMetadata.description: Page number of the page from which the image was scanned.

tagMetadata.name: TransferFunction
tagMetadata.description: Tables that specify transfer functions for the image.

tagMetadata.name: SoftwareUsed
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name and version of the software or firmware of the device used to generate the image.

tagMetadata.name: DateTime
tagMetadata.description: Date and time the image was created.

tagMetadata.name: Artist
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the person who created the image.

tagMetadata.name: HostComputer
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the computer and/or operating system used to create the image.

tagMetadata.name: Predictor
tagMetadata.description: Type of prediction scheme that was applied to the image data before the encoding scheme was applied.

tagMetadata.name: WhitePoint
tagMetadata.description: Chromaticity of the white point of the image.

tagMetadata.name: PrimaryChromaticities
tagMetadata.description: For each of the three primary colors in the image, the chromaticity of that color.

tagMetadata.name: ColorMap
tagMetadata.description: Color palette (lookup table) for a palette-indexed image.

tagMetadata.name: HalftoneHints
tagMetadata.description: Information used by the halftone function

tagMetadata.name: TileWidth
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixel columns in each tile.

tagMetadata.name: TileLength
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixel rows in each tile.

tagMetadata.name: TileOffset
tagMetadata.description: For each tile, the byte offset of that tile.

tagMetadata.name: TileByteCounts
tagMetadata.description: For each tile, the number of bytes in that tile.

tagMetadata.name: InkSet
tagMetadata.description: Set of inks used in a separated image.

tagMetadata.name: InkNames
tagMetadata.description: Sequence of concatenated, null-terminated, character strings that specify the names of the inks used in a separated image.

tagMetadata.name: NumberOfInks
tagMetadata.description: Number of inks.

tagMetadata.name: DotRange
tagMetadata.description: Color component values that correspond to a 0 percent dot and a 100 percent dot.

tagMetadata.name: TargetPrinter
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that describes the intended printing environment.

tagMetadata.name: ExtraSamples
tagMetadata.description: Number of extra color components. For example, one extra component might hold an alpha value.

tagMetadata.name: SampleFormat
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, the numerical format (unsigned, signed, floating point) of that component.

tagMetadata.name: SMinSampleValue
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, the minimum value of that component.

tagMetadata.name: SMaxSampleValue
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, the maximum value of that component.

tagMetadata.name: TransferRange
tagMetadata.description: Table of values that extends the range of the transfer function.

tagMetadata.name: Proc
tagMetadata.description: JPEG compression process.

tagMetadata.name: InterFormat
tagMetadata.description: Offset to the start of a JPEG bitstream.

tagMetadata.name: InterLength
tagMetadata.description: Length, in bytes, of the JPEG bitstream.

tagMetadata.name: RestartInterval
tagMetadata.description: Length of the restart interval.

tagMetadata.name: LosslessPredictors
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, a lossless predictor-selection value for that component.

tagMetadata.name: PointTransforms
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, a point transformation value for that component.

tagMetadata.name: QTables
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, the offset to the quantization table for that component.

tagMetadata.name: DCTables
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, the offset to the DC Huffman table (or lossless Huffman table) for that component.

tagMetadata.name: ACTables
tagMetadata.description: For each color component, the offset to the AC Huffman table for that component.

tagMetadata.name: YCbCrCoefficients
tagMetadata.description: Coefficients for transformation from RGB to YCbCr image data.

tagMetadata.name: YCbCrSubsampling
tagMetadata.description: Sampling ratio of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.

tagMetadata.name: YCbCrPositioning
tagMetadata.description: Position of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.

tagMetadata.name: REFBlackWhite
tagMetadata.description: Reference black point value and reference white point value.

tagMetadata.name: Gamma
tagMetadata.description: Gamma value attached to the image. The gamma value is stored as a rational number (pair of long) with a numerator of 100000. For example, a gamma value of 2.2 is stored as the pair (100000, 45455).

tagMetadata.name: ICCProfileDescriptor
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that identifies an ICC profile.

tagMetadata.name: SRGBRenderingIntent
tagMetadata.description: How the image should be displayed as defined by the International Color Consortium (ICC).

tagMetadata.name: ImageTitle
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the title of the image.

tagMetadata.name: ResolutionXUnit
tagMetadata.description: Units in which to display horizontal resolution.

tagMetadata.name: ResolutionYUnit
tagMetadata.description: Units in which to display vertical resolution.

tagMetadata.name: ResolutionXLengthUnit
tagMetadata.description: Units in which to display the image width.

tagMetadata.name: ResolutionYLengthUnit
tagMetadata.description: Units in which to display the image height.

tagMetadata.name: PrintFlags
tagMetadata.description: Sequence of one-byte Boolean values that specify printing options.

tagMetadata.name: PrintFlagsVersion
tagMetadata.description: Print flags version.

tagMetadata.name: PrintFlagsCrop
tagMetadata.description: Print flags center crop marks.

tagMetadata.name: PrintFlagsBleedWidth
tagMetadata.description: Print flags bleed width.

tagMetadata.name: PrintFlagsBleedWidthScale
tagMetadata.description: Print flags bleed width scale.

tagMetadata.name: HalftoneLPI
tagMetadata.description: Ink's screen frequency, in lines per inch.

tagMetadata.name: HalftoneLPIUnit
tagMetadata.description: Units for the screen frequency.

tagMetadata.name: HalftoneDegree
tagMetadata.description: Angle for screen.

tagMetadata.name: HalftoneShape
tagMetadata.description: Shape of the halftone dots.

tagMetadata.name: HalftoneMisc
tagMetadata.description: Miscellaneous halftone information.

tagMetadata.name: HalftoneScreen
tagMetadata.description: Boolean value that specifies whether to use the printer's default screens.

tagMetadata.name: JPEGQuality
tagMetadata.description: Private tag used by the Adobe Photoshop format. Not for public use.

tagMetadata.name: GridSize
tagMetadata.description: Block of information about grids and guides.

tagMetadata.name: Format
tagMetadata.description: Format of the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: Width
tagMetadata.description: Width, in pixels, of the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: Height
tagMetadata.description: Height, in pixels, of the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: ColorDepth
tagMetadata.description: bits per pixel (BPP) for the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: Planes
tagMetadata.description: Number of color planes for the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: RawBytes
tagMetadata.description: Byte offset between rows of pixel data.

tagMetadata.name: Size
tagMetadata.description: Total size, in bytes, of the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: CompressedSize
tagMetadata.description: Compressed size, in bytes, of the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: ColorTransferFunction
tagMetadata.description: Table of values that specify color transfer functions.

tagMetadata.name: Data
tagMetadata.description: Raw thumbnail bits in JPEG or RGB format. Depends on ThumbnailFormat.

tagMetadata.name: ImageWidth
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixels per row in the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: ImageHeight
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixel rows in the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: BitsPerSample
tagMetadata.description: Number of bits per color component in the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: Compression
tagMetadata.description: Compression scheme used for thumbnail image data.

tagMetadata.name: PhotometricInterp
tagMetadata.description: How thumbnail pixel data will be interpreted.

tagMetadata.name: ImageDescription
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the title of the image.

tagMetadata.name: EquipMake
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the manufacturer of the equipment used to record the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: EquipModel
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the model name or model number of the equipment used to record the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: StripOffsets
tagMetadata.description: For each strip in the thumbnail image, the byte offset of that strip.

tagMetadata.name: Orientation
tagMetadata.description: Thumbnail image orientation in terms of rows and columns.

tagMetadata.name: SamplesPerPixel
tagMetadata.description: Number of color components per pixel in the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: RowsPerStrip
tagMetadata.description: Number of rows per strip in the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: StripBytesCount
tagMetadata.description: For each thumbnail image strip, the total number of bytes in that strip.

tagMetadata.name: ResolutionX
tagMetadata.description: Thumbnail resolution in the width direction. The resolution unit is given in ThumbnailResolutionUnit.

tagMetadata.name: ResolutionY
tagMetadata.description: Thumbnail resolution in the height direction. The resolution unit is given in ThumbnailResolutionUnit.

tagMetadata.name: PlanarConfig
tagMetadata.description: Whether pixel components in the thumbnail image are recorded in chunky or planar format.

tagMetadata.name: ResolutionUnit
tagMetadata.description: Unit of measure for the horizontal resolution and the vertical resolution of the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: TransferFunction
tagMetadata.description: Tables that specify transfer functions for the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: SoftwareUsed
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name and version of the software or firmware of the device used to generate the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: DateTime
tagMetadata.description: Date and time the thumbnail image was created.

tagMetadata.name: Artist
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the person who created the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: WhitePoint
tagMetadata.description: Chromaticity of the white point of the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: PrimaryChromaticities
tagMetadata.description: For each of the three primary colors in the thumbnail image, the chromaticity of that color.

tagMetadata.name: YCbCrCoefficients
tagMetadata.description: Coefficients for transformation from RGB to YCbCr data for the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: YCbCrSubsampling
tagMetadata.description: Sampling ratio of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component for the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: YCbCrPositioning
tagMetadata.description: Position of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component for the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: RefBlackWhite
tagMetadata.description: Reference black point value and reference white point value for the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: CopyRight
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that contains copyright information for the thumbnail image.

tagMetadata.name: LuminanceTable
tagMetadata.description: Luminance table. The luminance table and the chrominance table are used to control JPEG quality. A valid luminance or chrominance table has 64 entries of type Short. If an image has either a luminance table or a chrominance table, then it must have both tables.

tagMetadata.name: ChrominanceTable
tagMetadata.description: Chrominance table. The luminance table and the chrominance table are used to control JPEG quality. A valid luminance or chrominance table has 64 entries of type Short. If an image has either a luminance table or a chrominance table, then it must have both tables.

tagMetadata.name: FrameDelay
tagMetadata.description: Time delay, in hundredths of a second, between two frames in an animated GIF image.

tagMetadata.name: LoopCount
tagMetadata.description: For an animated GIF image, the number of times to display the animation. A value of 0 specifies that the animation should be displayed infinitely.

tagMetadata.name: PixelUnit
tagMetadata.description: Unit for PixelPerUnitX and PixelPerUnitY.

tagMetadata.name: PixelPerUnitX
tagMetadata.description: Pixels per unit in the x direction.

tagMetadata.name: PixelPerUnitY
tagMetadata.description: Pixels per unit in the y direction.

tagMetadata.name: PaletteHistogram
tagMetadata.description: Palette histogram.

tagMetadata.name: Copyright
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that contains copyright information.

tagMetadata.name: ExposureTime
tagMetadata.description: Exposure time, measured in seconds.

tagMetadata.name: FNumber
tagMetadata.description: F number.

tagMetadata.name: IFD
tagMetadata.description: Private tag used by GDI+. Not for public use. GDI+ uses this tag to locate Exif-specific information.

tagMetadata.name: ICCProfile
tagMetadata.description: ICC profile embedded in the image.

tagMetadata.name: ExposureProg
tagMetadata.description: Class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.

option.value: Creative program (biased toward depth of field)
Action program (biased toward fast shutter speed)
Portrait mode (for closeup photos with the background out of focus)
Landscape mode (for landscape photos with the background in focus)

tagMetadata.name: SpectralSense
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies the spectral sensitivity of each channel of the camera used. The string is compatible with the standard developed by the ASTM Technical Committee.

tagMetadata.name: GpsIFD
tagMetadata.description: Offset to a block of GPS property items. Property items whose tags have the prefix Gps are stored in the GPS block. The GPS property items are defined in the EXIF specification. GDI+ uses this tag to locate GPS information, but GDI+ does not expose this tag for public use.

tagMetadata.name: ISOSpeed
tagMetadata.description: ISO speed and ISO latitude of the camera or input device as specified in ISO 12232.

tagMetadata.name: OECF
tagMetadata.description: Optoelectronic conversion function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524. The OECF is the relationship between the camera optical input and the image values.

tagMetadata.name: Ver
tagMetadata.description: Version of the EXIF standard supported. Nonexistence of this field is taken to mean nonconformance to the standard. Conformance to the standard is indicated by recording 0210 as a 4-byte ASCII string. Because the type is Undefined, there is no NULL terminator.

tagMetadata.name: DTOrig
tagMetadata.description: Date and time when the original image data was generated. For a DSC, the date and time when the picture was taken. The format is YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS with time shown in 24-hour format and the date and time separated by one blank character (0x2000). The character string length is 20 bytes including the NULL terminator. When the field is empty, it is treated as unknown.

tagMetadata.name: DTDigitized
tagMetadata.description: Date and time when the image was stored as digital data. If, for example, an image was captured by DSC and at the same time the file was recorded, then DateTimeOriginal and DateTimeDigitized will have the same contents. The format is YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS with time shown in 24-hour format and the date and time separated by one blank character (0x2000). The character string length is 20 bytes including the NULL terminator. When the field is empty, it is treated as unknown.

tagMetadata.name: CompConfig
tagMetadata.description: Information specific to compressed data. The channels of each component are arranged in order from the first component to the fourth. For uncompressed data, the data arrangement is given in the PhotometricInterp tag. However, because PhotometricInterp can only express the order of Y, Cb, and Cr, this tag is provided for cases when compressed data uses components other than Y, Cb, and Cr and to support other sequences.

tagMetadata.name: CompBPP
tagMetadata.description: Information specific to compressed data. The compression mode used for a compressed image is indicated in unit BPP.

tagMetadata.name: ShutterSpeed
tagMetadata.description: Shutter speed. The unit is the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) value.

tagMetadata.name: Aperture
tagMetadata.description: Lens aperture. The unit is the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) value.

tagMetadata.name: Brightness
tagMetadata.description: Brightness value. The unit is the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of -99.99 to 99.99.

tagMetadata.name: ExposureBias
tagMetadata.description: Exposure bias. The unit is the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) value. Ordinarily it is given in the range -99.99 to 99.99.

tagMetadata.name: MaxAperture
tagMetadata.description: Smallest F number of the lens. The unit is the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of 00.00 to 99.99, but it is not limited to this range.

tagMetadata.name: SubjectDist
tagMetadata.description: Distance to the subject, measured in meters.

tagMetadata.name: MeteringMode
tagMetadata.description: Metering mode.

tagMetadata.name: LightSource
tagMetadata.description: Type of light source.

tagMetadata.name: Flash
tagMetadata.description: Flash status. This tag is recorded when an image is taken using a strobe light (flash). Bit 0 indicates the flash firing status, and bits 1 and 2 indicate the flash return status.

tagMetadata.name: FocalLength
tagMetadata.description: Actual focal length, in millimeters, of the lens. Conversion is not made to the focal length of a 35 millimeter film camera.

tagMetadata.name: MakerNote
tagMetadata.description: Note tag. A tag used by manufacturers of EXIF writers to record information. The contents are up to the manufacturer.

tagMetadata.name: UserComment
tagMetadata.description: Comment tag. A tag used by EXIF users to write keywords or comments about the image besides those in ImageDescription and without the character-code limitations of the ImageDescription tag.

tagMetadata.name: DTSubsec
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the DateTime tag.

tagMetadata.name: DTOrigSS
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the ExifDTOrig tag.

tagMetadata.name: DTDigSS
tagMetadata.description: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the ExifDTDigitized tag.

tagMetadata.name: FPXVer
tagMetadata.description: FlashPix format version supported by an FPXR file. If the FPXR function supports FlashPix format version 1.0, this is indicated similarly to ExifVer by recording 0100 as a 4-byte ASCII string. Because the type is Undefined, there is no NULL terminator.

tagMetadata.name: ColorSpace
tagMetadata.description: Color space specifier. Normally sRGB (=1) is used to define the color space based on the PC monitor conditions and environment. If a color space other than sRGB is used, Uncalibrated (=0xFFFF) is set. Image data recorded as Uncalibrated can be treated as sRGB when it is converted to FlashPix.

tagMetadata.name: PixXDim
tagMetadata.description: Information specific to compressed data. When a compressed file is recorded, the valid width of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag, whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker. This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file.

tagMetadata.name: PixYDim
tagMetadata.description: Information specific to compressed data. When a compressed file is recorded, the valid height of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker. This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file. Because data padding is unnecessary in the vertical direction, the number of lines recorded in this valid image height tag will be the same as that recorded in the SOF.

tagMetadata.name: RelatedWav
tagMetadata.description: The name of an audio file related to the image data. The only relational information recorded is the EXIF audio file name and extension (an ASCII string that consists of 8 characters plus a period (.), plus 3 characters). The path is not recorded. When you use this tag, audio files must be recorded in conformance with the EXIF audio format. Writers can also store audio data within APP2 as FlashPix extension stream data.

tagMetadata.name: Interop
tagMetadata.description: Offset to a block of property items that contain interoperability information.

tagMetadata.name: FlashEnergy
tagMetadata.description: Strobe energy, in Beam Candle Power Seconds (BCPS), at the time the image was captured.

tagMetadata.name: SpatialFR
tagMetadata.description: Camera or input device spatial frequency table and SFR values in the image width, image height, and diagonal direction, as specified in ISO 12233.

tagMetadata.name: FocalXRes
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixels in the image width (x) direction per unit on the camera focal plane. The unit is specified in ExifFocalResUnit.

tagMetadata.name: FocalYRes
tagMetadata.description: Number of pixels in the image height (y) direction per unit on the camera focal plane. The unit is specified in ExifFocalResUnit.

tagMetadata.name: FocalResUnit
tagMetadata.description: Unit of measure for ExifFocalXRes and ExifFocalYRes.

tagMetadata.name: SubjectLoc
tagMetadata.description: Location of the main subject in the scene. The value of this tag represents the pixel at the center of the main subject relative to the left edge. The first value indicates the column number, and the second value indicates the row number.

tagMetadata.name: ExposureIndex
tagMetadata.description: Exposure index selected on the camera or input device at the time the image was captured.

tagMetadata.name: SensingMethod
tagMetadata.description: Image sensor type on the camera or input device.

tagMetadata.name: FileSource
tagMetadata.description: The image source. If a DSC recorded the image, the value of this tag is 3.

tagMetadata.name: SceneType
tagMetadata.description: The type of scene. If a DSC recorded the image, the value of this tag must be set to 1, indicating that the image was directly photographed.

tagMetadata.name: CfaPattern
tagMetadata.description: The color filter array (CFA) geometric pattern of the image sensor when a one-chip color area sensor is used. It does not apply to all sensing methods.
